nodes.text: The Selander was a Corellian Engineering Corporation Assassin-class corvette operated by the Ripoblus.
During a battle in the Sepan Civil War, the Selander, along with its sister ship, the Galliot, attacked the Dimok XQ1 Platform Science Station Youst.

Maarek Stele, in a TIE Bomber launched from Imperial Admiral Harkov's flagship, the Victory I-class Star Destroyer Protector, carried out a warhead attack in defense of the Dimok platform that drove off the Ripoblus reprisal.
